title: Fort Union National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Post Commander's Quarters - First Fort Union                Second Fort Union Barracks                Officer's Row - Third Fort Union               Remembering The Past                Adobe Remnants               Sunset on Adobe Remnants                Barracks Party              During its forty year history, Fort Union grealty affected the American Southwest and the lives of the multitude of peoples that call this area home. We invite you to explore the rich and profound history of Fort Union on the following pages as well as learn about the many opportunities that Fort Union National Monument offers to connect you to this place that brought forth such insurmountable change to New Mexico and beyond.        Park Newspaper & News Releases Photos and Mulimedia Presentations  History and Culture Kids & Youth  Be a Junior Ranger  Civil War to Civil Rights Trading Cards Management   Bookstore
